heading: HR01774
0: RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS TO EXCLUDE ANY FOREIGN ENTITY/INDIVIDUAL AS PROVIDER OF GOODS, MACHINES, SERVICES AND/OR TECHNICAL SUPPORT WHICH SHALL BE USED FOR NATIONAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS, AND TO INCLUDE IN THE CRITERIA FOR ELIGIBILITY THAT THE PROSPECTIVE BIDDER BE FULLY OWNED BY A FILIPINO ENTITY OR INDIVIDUAL
status: Pending with the Committee on SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS since 2018-03-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01774
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS TO EXCLUDE ANY FOREIGN ENTITY/INDIVIDUAL AS PROVIDER OF GOODS, MACHINES, SERVICES AND/OR TECHNICAL SUPPORT WHICH SHALL BE USED FOR NATIONAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS, AND TO INCLUDE IN THE CRITERIA FOR ELIGIBILITY THAT THE PROSPECTIVE BIDDER BE FULLY OWNED BY A FILIPINO ENTITY OR INDIVIDUAL
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ATIENZA, JOSE JR. L.
DATE FILED : 2018-03-14
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS ON 2018-03-19
